name: Frank and Drac's Embarrassment Party
description:
Installation: Download .zip file, extract both files from .zip and open the .exe 

Housemates Frankenstein and Dracula are the biggest, baddest monsters in town.

You are their house.

You know their secrets. They aren't the big scary monsters they claim to be - but nobody can know!

Tonight, they host a Halloween party and have invited many guests. Dracula and Frankenstein will try to embarrass themselves and ruin their reputation - it's your job to make sure the guests don't see.
